name: insider-threat-video-analyzer
description: React video analysis library for insider threat detection with FastAPI backend

scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend-fastapi && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.seed:docker: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend python seed.py
